name: Smart 4K LED TV
description: Experience breathtaking visuals with our Smart 4K LED TV. Enjoy your favorite movies and shows in stunning 4K resolution. It comes with built-in streaming apps for endless entertainment.

name: Smartwatch Series 5
description: Stay connected and active with our latest Smartwatch Series 5. Track your fitness, receive notifications, and enjoy a sleek design that complements your style.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: Unleash your gaming potential with our high-performance Gaming Laptop. Equipped with a powerful processor and a dedicated GPU, it's your gateway to immersive gaming experiences.

name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Immerse yourself in music with our Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones. Block out distractions and enjoy high-quality sound on the go.

name: Digital Camera Kit
description: Capture life's moments with precision using our Digital Camera Kit. It includes a high-resolution camera, multiple lenses, and accessories for photography enthusiasts.

name: Home Security System
description: Protect your home with our Home Security System. Monitor your property with HD cameras, motion sensors, and remote access for peace of mind.
